title: Studies
content: Why are only our juniors, seniors and our batch the only ones who are vigorously studying and doing everything all the time, doing isa/esa and then projects whereas our senior's senior's and everyone before them just graduated without doing literally nothing, just did nothing and they got their degree and are chilling in their life, meanwhile us who are struggling so much for everything, just why

comments.body:
Your ass already got whooped in the first year kid. In the coming sems you're gonna see hell wait and watch and who TF told you the seniors did nothing and graduated? Sit in a placement drive or a capstone project review let's see how you do it.
If you don't know things it's better you keep quiet or ask a senior ðŸ˜‡ðŸ˜‡
